title: MAJOR Gaming PC Transformation! - Gear Up S1:E2
description: SPONSORS: New Customer Exclusive - $25 Off ALL Processors:    Shop VIP-SCDKey OEM Windows 10 Pro keys for $16 and use code 'SKGS' for a 25% discount:    Welcome to our Gear Up series! In this episode, we meet with Jacob at the Marietta, GA Micro Center to upgrade his old gaming PC! He's currently rockin' an AMD Ryzen 5 2600 and GTX 1060. Let's see what budget he wins and how he spends it!   Consider supporting us on Patreon!   Shop Micro Center's Apple Savings Event:  Get Exclusive Deals at Micro Center's New Store in Indianapolis:  Submit your build to Micro Center's Build Showcase:     PC parts list: ASUS B550-F ROG Strix Wi-Fi II Motherboard:   AMD Ryzen 7 5800X3D Processor:  ASUS NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060Ti Dual Fan White Graphics Card:  Corsair RM850x 850 Watt Power Supply:  Deep Cool AK620 CPU Cooler:  Crucial P3 Plus 500GB M.2 Internal SSD:    My studio gear on Amazon: Sony A7C (Primary):  Sony a6600 (Secondary):  Sony a6400 (Webcam):  2x Pixio PX277 Prime 165Hz IPS Monitors:  Neewer LED Lighting Kit:  Audio-Technica AT2035:  Yamaha MG10XU Mixer:  Neewer Microphone Arms:  Arrowzoom Sound-Damping Foam Panels:    Follow me on social media: TWITCH:  FACEBOOK:  TWITTER:  INSTAGRAM:    Join our public Discord server:   DISCLOSURES: All Genius links are tied to our Amazon Associate account, from which we earn a small sales commission. Links containing a 'bit.ly' reference forwarding to Newegg are tied to our Rakuten account, from which we earn a small sales commission. All sponsored links and comments will contain the word "SPONSOR" or "AD." Any additional revenue stream will be disclosed with similar verbiage.  #GearUp
